oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate $5.00 bank note
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This $5 Confederate note has a pink overprint and a picture of the Virginia State Capitol in the center. In the lower right corner of the note is a picture of Christopher Gustavu Memminger. Memminger was born in Germany but immigrated with his parents to South Carolina. Memminger was the Confederate Secretary of the Treasury from February 1861 to July 1864.
